channel.title: generative on Palmdrop
channel.description: Recent content in generative on Palmdrop

item.title: The Characteristics of Modified Noise
item.description: Regular gradient noise, such as Perlin and Simplex noise, is extremely useful for procedurally generating textures, flowfields, heightmaps, etc. But a texture or heightmap created using plain noise is rarely that interesting. Often, noise is modified or used in unique, creative ways.
